attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
to demonstrate that the United Kingdom does not recognise the occupation of Gaza and the West Bank and the annexation of Jerusalem contrary to International Law.

We call on Israel to dismantle the illegal settlements and implement UN resolution 242, and allow free movement of the Palestinian people within the occupied territories.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
